name: IceScream
description:
An Icecream monster has taken control of your Icecream truck and now he's eating all the kids! Save the kids and defeat the monster with the magic cherries! 

How to play: 

* W,A,S,D to move 

*Collision with the kids to save them

*Find 3 cherries and feed them to the moster to destroy it

*If the monster eats 5 kids you lose!
